summary: This appears to be a communication from or regarding Jeffrey Epstein, referencing his registration number, a discontinued 'Psych Ops' program, and his location at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The document includes attachments and is addressed to a Bureau of Prisons email address.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document is 'From Subject Epstein' and includes his federal Bureau of Prisons registration number (76318-054). He is the central subject of the communication.

events.title: Psych Ops Discontinued

events.title: Correspondence Date

locations: MCC New York, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a communication from or regarding Jeffrey Epstein, bearing his BOP registration number 76318-054.
It references a 'Psych Ops' (Psychological Operations) program that was discontinued on July 30, 2018, at 8:15 am.
Epstein's location is identified as the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY 10007.
The document includes attachments named 'TEXT.htm' and '2019_08_10_18_12_55.pdf'.
It is addressed to a Bureau of Prisons email address (NYM/AW-Programs-@bop.gov), suggesting official prison program correspondence.
